name: El Platanazo!
description:
Want to try a crazy arcade game?!

Experience this unique sharpshooting pinball-like game where you control a cannon and start shooting random stuff such as mangoes and plantains to knock out Nicolasno. Once knocked out, bounce him around to get extra points!

Everything is done by click and drag. It is also recommended to play it with a mouse

This game is also supported for Android. To try it on your Android device, download the android version of the game below, install it and play it!

Enjoy!

William's Productions

williambracho@yahoo.com
